comment.author: 74471476@N08
comment._content: Could the presence of the telephone pole (if that's what it is) help date this image more specifically?

comment.author: 46317563@N04
comment._content: This photograph was taken in 1883...the statue of Washington was dedicated on November 26th of that year, Chester Alan Arthur was present: www.flickr.com/photos/46317563@N04/8688559341/in/photostream A law was passed in 1884 banning all poles...the blizzard of 1888 took care of most of these ...

comment.author: 74471476@N08
comment._content: Thank you for writing back.  I'm impressed with the depth of your knowledge.
